description: An easy recipe that delivers loads of hearty flavour? This beef rissole and potato bake recipe ticks the boxes. This is a comforting, warming family meal.
keywords: 3-Ingredient Beef & Barbecue Sauce Rissoles With Potato Bake
name: 3-Ingredient Beef & Barbecue Sauce Rissoles With Potato Bake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide potato bake and rissoles among plates. Drizzle with sauce mixture and serve with beans.
